text.__SUMMARY__: Solanum dolichorhachis is a species of plant in the family Solanaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador.
text.Sources: Montúfar, R. & Pitman, N. (2004). "Solanum dolichorhachis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2004: e.T46332A11049591. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2004.RLTS.T46332A11049591.en. Retrieved 15 January 2018.
